content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I am having a lot of anxiety about quitting my current job. It is too stressful but pays well.
I am very sorry to hear that. I think it has been a stressful time for everyone. Is there a particular type of job that you' d like to do that would make you happy?
Do you have any specific experience that you' d like to try? That is a great start! It can be very rewarding.
